scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -n 'frontend,electron,backend' -c 'yellow,blue,green' 'cd frontend && VITE_WATCH=true npm run dev' 'electron .' 'cd backend && fastapi dev main.py --port=8345'
scripts.dev:web: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently -n 'frontend,backend' -c 'yellow,green' 'cd frontend && VITE_WATCH=true npm run build:watch' 'cd backend && fastapi dev main.py'
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run package
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:frontend && python build.py --backend-only && npm run package
